info.title: Hummingbot Gateway
info.description: API endpoints for interacting with DEX connectors on various blockchain networks

get.description: Get configuration settings. Returns all configurations if no chain/connector is specified.

post.description: Update a specific configuration value by its path

get.description: Get default pools for a specific connector and pool type

parameters.name: connector
parameters.description: Connector name in format "connector/type" (e.g., raydium/amm, raydium/clmm, uniswap/amm, uniswap/clmm, meteora/clmm)

post.description: Add a default pool for a specific connector

connector.description: Connector name in format "connector/type" (e.g., raydium/amm, raydium/clmm, uniswap/amm, uniswap/clmm, meteora/clmm)

poolAddress.description: Pool address (required for adding, optional for removal)

post.description: Remove a default pool for a specific connector

get.description: Get all wallets across different chains

post.description: Add a new wallet using a private key

delete.description: Remove a wallet by its address

post.description: Sign a message with a specific wallet

get.description: Returns a list of available DEX connectors and their supported blockchain networks.
Returns a list of available blockchain networks supported by Gateway.
Get Jupiter swap quote

post.description: Execute Jupiter swap

priorityFeePerCU.description: Priority fee per compute unit (microlamports on Solana)

get.description: Fetch info about Meteora pools
Get pool information for a Meteora pool
Retrieve a list of positions owned by a user's wallet in a specific Meteora pool

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Will use first available wallet if not specified

get.description: Get details for a specific Meteora position

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Will use first available wallet if not specified

get.description: Get swap quote for Meteora CLMM

post.description: Execute a token swap on Meteora

priorityFeePerCU.description: Priority fee per compute unit (microlamports on Solana)

post.description: Open a new Meteora position
Add liquidity to a Meteora position
Remove liquidity from a Meteora position
Collect fees from a Meteora position
Close a Meteora position

get.description: Get CLMM pool information from Raydium
Retrieve a list of positions owned by a user's wallet in a specific Raydium CLMM pool
Get info about a Raydium CLMM position
Quote amounts for a new Raydium CLMM position
Get swap quote for Raydium CLMM

post.description: Execute a swap on Raydium CLMM

priorityFeePerCU.description: Priority fee per compute unit (microlamports on Solana)

post.description: Open a new Raydium CLMM position
Add liquidity to existing Raydium CLMM position
Remove liquidity from Raydium CLMM position
Collect fees from a Raydium CLMM position
Close a Raydium CLMM position

get.description: Get AMM pool information from Raydium
Get info about a Raydium AMM position
Quote amounts for a new Raydium AMM liquidity position
Get swap quote for Raydium AMM

post.description: Execute a swap on Raydium AMM or CPMM

priorityFeePerCU.description: Priority fee per compute unit (microlamports on Solana)

post.description: Add liquidity to a Raydium AMM/CPMM pool
Remove liquidity from a Raydium AMM/CPMM pool

get.description: Get a swap quote using Uniswap AlphaRouter (mainnet only)

post.description: Execute a swap using Uniswap V3 Smart Order Router (mainnet only)

get.description: Get AMM pool information from Uniswap V2
Get position information for a Uniswap V2 pool
Get swap quote for Uniswap V2 AMM
Get liquidity quote for a Uniswap V2 pool

post.description: Execute a swap on Uniswap V2 AMM using Router02

priorityFeePerCU.description: Priority fee per compute unit (microlamports on Solana)

post.description: Add liquidity to a Uniswap V2 pool
Remove liquidity from a Uniswap V2 pool

get.description: Get CLMM pool information from Uniswap V3
Get swap quote for Uniswap V3 CLMM
Get position information for a Uniswap V3 position
Get all Uniswap V3 positions owned by a wallet
Get a quote for opening a position on Uniswap V3

post.description: Open a new liquidity position in a Uniswap V3 pool
Execute a swap on Uniswap V3 CLMM using SwapRouter02

priorityFeePerCU.description: Priority fee per compute unit (microlamports on Solana)

post.description: Add liquidity to an existing Uniswap V3 position
Remove liquidity from a Uniswap V3 position
Collect fees from a Uniswap V3 position
Close a Uniswap V3 position by removing all liquidity and collecting fees

get.description: Get Solana network status
Get list of supported Solana tokens with their addresses and decimals

post.description: Get token balances for a Solana address. If no tokens specified or empty array provided, returns non-zero balances for tokens from the token list that are found in the wallet (includes SOL even if zero). If specific tokens are requested, returns those exact tokens with their balances, including zeros.

tokens.description: A list of token symbols (SOL, USDC, BONK) or token mint addresses. Both formats are accepted and will be automatically detected. An empty array is treated the same as if the parameter was not provided, returning only non-zero balances (with the exception of SOL).

200.description: Token balances for the specified address

schema.description: Token balances for the specified address

post.description: Poll for the status of a Solana transaction
Estimate gas prices for Solana transactions

get.description: Get Ethereum chain status
Get Ethereum tokens

post.description: Get Ethereum balances. If no tokens specified or empty array provided, returns native token (ETH) and only non-zero balances for tokens from the token list. If specific tokens are requested, returns those exact tokens with their balances, including zeros.

tokens.description: A list of token symbols or addresses. An empty array is treated the same as if the parameter was not provided, returning only non-zero balances plus the native token.

post.description: Poll Ethereum transaction status
Get token allowances

spender.description: Spender can be a connector name (e.g., uniswap/clmm, uniswap/amm, uniswap) or a direct contract address

post.description: Approve token spending

spender.description: Spender can be a connector name (e.g., uniswap/clmm, uniswap/amm, uniswap) or a direct contract address

amount.description: The amount to approve. If not provided, defaults to maximum amount (unlimited approval).

post.description: Estimate gas prices for Ethereum transactions
Wrap native token to wrapped token (e.g., ETH to WETH, BNB to WBNB)

amount.description: The amount of native token to wrap (e.g., ETH, BNB, AVAX)
